hw13
Class ImageSelector

java.lang.Object
  hw13.ImageSelector

public class ImageSelector
extends java.lang.Object

The image selector class. This class provides the functionality to create a Graph2D object surrounded by a polygon formed by following edges on the image passing through points provided by the user..

          The class calculating the shortest path

          Stores the image being displayed

Parameters:
img - The image to be displayed.

select

public Graph2D select()
Creates the Graph2D object representing the image surrounded by the current polygon using a breadth-first search. This method should be called to finalize the selection.

Returns:
The Graph2D object representing the selected image.
